topic.title: Plan Of Treatment Section2 - conformance rules

section.p: This section, formerly known as "Plan of Care", contains data that define pending orders, interventions, encounters, services, and procedures for the patient. It is limited to prospective, unfulfilled, or incomplete orders and requests only. These are indicated by the @moodCode of the entries within this section. All active, incomplete, or pending orders, appointments, referrals, procedures, services, or any other pending event of clinical significance to the current care of the patient should be listed. This section may also contain information about ongoing care of the patient, clinical reminders, patient's values, beliefs, preferences, care expectations, and overarching care goals. Clinical reminders are placed here to provide prompts for disease prevention and management, patient safety, and healthcare quality improvements, including widely accepted performance measures. Values may include the importance of quality of life over longevity. These values are taken into account when prioritizing all problems and their treatments. Beliefs may include comfort with dying or the refusal of blood transfusions because of the patient's religious convictions.???? Preferences may include liquid medicines over tablets, or treatment via secure email instead of in person. Care expectations may range from being treated only by female clinicians, to expecting all calls to be returned within 24 hours. Overarching goals described in this section are not tied to a specific condition, problem, health concern, or intervention. Examples of overarching goals could be to minimize pain or dependence on others, or to walk a daughter down the aisle for her marriage.???? The plan may also indicate that patient education will be provided.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-7723, CONF:1098-10435, CONF:1098-32501 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.10"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Plan Of Care Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.10)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-14749)/@code="18776-5" Plan of Treatment (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-14750, CONF:1098-30813)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-7726, CONF:1098-14751)

</section>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10435 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.10"
SHALL conform to CDA Section
Consol Plan Of Care Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14749)/@code="18776-5" Treatment plan (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:14750)
Consol Plan Of Care Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:16986, R2.0=CONF:1098-16986)
Consol Plan Of Care Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7725, R2.0=CONF:1098-7725)

Consol Plan Of Care Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:7726.CONF:8804) Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Act (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.39)

Consol Plan Of Care Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8805, CONF:8806) Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Encounter (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.40)

Consol Plan Of Care Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8808, CONF:8807) Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.44)

Consol Plan Of Care Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8809, CONF:8810) Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.41)

Consol Plan Of Care Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8811, CONF:8812) Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Substance Administration (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.42)

Consol Plan Of Care Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:8813, CONF:14756) Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity Supply (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.43)

Consol Plan Of Care Section If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:14695, CONF:16751) Conforms to Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)
